ygData.subject: grouping with RL husband
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes we have seperate accounts. At first we didnt , but i stay at home with my daughter and he works. So i would play in the dy and he would play at night. Now
ygData.messageBody:
Yes we have seperate accounts. At first we didnt , but i stay at home
with my daughter and he works. So i would play in the dy and he would
play at night. Now we just play together. I also think its a lot
easier. you don't have to look for a group, and talking is a lot
easier than typing when your in trouble. But yes there are times when
we get mad at each other over something in game , but we dont take it
to seriously. He plays more than i do but if he starts to get to far
ahead he lets me take all the exp. for awhile
I also know couples who can't stand to play together. Mostly
because when they play its an escape. We wanted to play together so we
could ahve a common interest . I think i'm ranting now so i'll shut up
;P Hope to hear from more of you soon.
